Blackfang dodged quickly the shots, took out his energy shotgun and 
fired four blast at his enemy.

Blackfang: I will rip you apart, take back my knife and then slit your 
throat and your pitiful excuse for a spark!

He leaps at Perceptor, trying to kick him in the face.
